pd_0_com_0text: This planet is fascinating isn't it? You've probably noticed but we are surrounded by all four seasons at once.
pd_1_com_0text: No one knows how or why, but at the start of every year, all the seasons rotate around us a certain number of times
pd_2_com_0text: It's already year five-eight (58) and no one has yet to figure out how the seasons rotate. Maybe you can? *Chuckle*
pd_3_com_0text: Wait did you say five-eight??? Did you mean fifty eight?
pd_4_com_0text: What's that? It might be different in your culture but 58 is pronounced five-eight here. But anyways, speak with some of our villagers, they might provide some useful information if you want to attempt to solve the pattern
